title: Hour 2 – Covino and Rich Guest Host
itunes:title: Hour 2 – Covino and Rich Guest Host
description:
Covino and Rich fill in for Dan Patrick and the crew. Rich is super pumped about one Mets player who hit a homerun in his first Major League at bat, but not for the actual hitting of the homerun. Who would you rather have see your search history: the parents or significant other? The guys give some props to LeBron James for signing a new extension and highlight how much he’s impacted the sports world.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
